entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers early this evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning near midnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h late in the evening. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
